comment: " [ W ] hen you speak of us Republicans , you do so only to denounce us as reptiles " - - A Lincoln , <URL>
amr:

(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "A"
                  :op2 "Lincoln"))
      :ARG1 (h / have-purpose-91
            :ARG1 (s2 / speak-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (w / we
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Republican")))))
            :ARG2 (d / denounce-01

                  :ARG1 w
                  :ARG2 (r / reptile)
                  :mod (o / only))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 s2))
      :ARG1-of (q / quote-01
            :ARG2 p))

comment: Try reading historian Heather Cox Richardson's non-fiction book on how the Republican party changed in years following Lincoln . " To Make Men Free : A History of the Republican Party " . It doesn't include what Trump & the current GOP in Congress have done to the party .
amr:
